title: Mitsukazu Mihara: IC in a Sunflower
description: The Gothic Lolita queen delivers breathtakingly beautiful art in this collection of stories that range from the tragic and romantic to the bizarre and unforgettable...and everything in between. These seven short stories intertwine chilling themes involving sex, abuse, murder, and cloning, all with Mihara-sensei's unique perspective on the human condition.
author: Mitsukazu Mihara
